properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.content-type
properties.description: The content type of the messages. Defaults to application/json

properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.destination
properties.description: The destination of the stream. Destination as defined by Spring Cloud Stream. Defaults to springCloudHystrixStream

properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.enabled
properties.description: Flag to indicate that Hystrix Stream is enabled. Default is true.

properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.gather-rate
properties.description: How often to put messages in the queue. This queue drains to the stream. Defaults to 500.

properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.prefix-metric-name
properties.description: Flag to indicate to prefix metric names with serviceId. Default is true.

properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.send-id
properties.description: Flag to indicate to send the id field in the metrics. Default is true

properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.send-rate
properties.description: How often (in ms) to send messages to the stream. Defaults to 500.

properties.name: hystrix.stream.queue.size
properties.description: The size of the metrics queue. This queue drains to the stream. Defaults to 1000.
